description: Professionally designed and renovated townhome in sought-after Birchland community! This bright & large 4bed + 3bathrooms + Den + Storage home has been completely renovated with quality finishes throughout - no expense spared. Straight from magazine feature wall & Spa-inspired bathrooms. Enjoy a chef's dream kitchen with spacious open living/dining layout, and two large private patios (front & south-facing back) perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Complex features new windows, brand-new roof, and low strata fees in a well-run, family & pet-friendly setting. Walking distance to schools, parks, transit, and all the shops at Prairie Mall & Coast Meridian Crossing. Comfort, convenience, and value all in one place!
